title: Should I get the iPhone 11 Pro or the iPhone 11 Pro Max, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A: I have no clue why I was requested to answer this question since I don't talk about phones and have owned only one apple product in my life, and that was an iPhone 3GS. I don't know which you should care, and I honestly don't think anyone cares or that it even matters. Next year there will be an iPhone 12 and it's the same nonsense over again. It's a phone, buy whichever one you want and whichever fits your budget. To many people constantly buy the newest thing and waste their money. I've had the same $200 phone for the last year or so and the only reason I bought it was because my old one (another $200 phone which I used for 2 years) shattered. I would never spend $700 on a phone, and that's the cheapest iPhone. I have better things to spend $1,000-$1,100 on. Look at their specs and features, see which “suits” your needs and get that one.

That depends.iPhone 11 is no upgrade to previous iPhone, its more of a downgrade with the cheaper LED screen.If you want 3 cameras the iPhone 11 Pro will do.If you need 3 cameras and a bigger screen get the iPhone 11 Pro Max. (But you will need bigger hands or some time to practice. A bigger phone is heavier and might break more easy).It’s just a lousy 100 bucks difference.
